entry.string: It is currently responsible for accomplishing these tasks:
entry.translation: It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur eccumpleeshing zeese-a tesks:

entry.string: Allows the use of "On this date in history..." Have historical references displayed within a block.
entry.translation: Elloos zee use-a ooff "On thees dete-a in heestury. Bork bork bork!.." Hefe-a heesturicel refferences deespleyed veethin a bluck.

entry.string: When you login as a website administrator, you are able to add, delete, view, and modify these historical references to your choosing.
entry.translation: Vhee yuoo lugeen es a vebseete-a edmeenistretur, yuoo ere-a eble-a tu edd, delete-a, feeoo, und mudeeffy zeese-a heesturicel refferences tu yuoor chuuseeng.

entry.string: Ephemerids -- Displays the content that you add depending on the day of the year.
entry.translation: Ephemereeds -- Deespleys zee cuntent thet yuoo edd dependeeng oon zee dey ooff zee yeer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!
Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded huuks. Um gesh dee bork, bork!
